title: appanum ammaiyum
sahitya:
appanum ammaiyum nIyE anrO aDimaiyai ANDaruLvAi aiyA en


anupallavi

  oppuyarvillAda prabhuvE nI engE onru mariyAp-pEdai nAnengE Ayinum en


caraNam    aNuvirkkum aNuvAgi mahattirkum mahattAgi anbargaLin manadil magizhndu
   viLaiyADum maNimArbA karuNAkara shambhO mAdoru bhAgA vEru tuNaiyillai en
